meta.content: eaves Old Town Pasadena - Apartments in Pasadena, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Old Town Pasadena – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We provide great Old Town Pasadena apartments with a few little extras, like updated kitchens with quartz stone countertops, stainless steel appliances, hard surface flooring, and gas fireplaces in each apartment. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. When it comes down to it, our apartments in Old Town Pasadena offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Pasadena Apartments by eaves There are many reasons why people choose to live in the historic Pasadena area, and you should be able to come home to a place where you can live comfortably. This is precisely what you will be able to do at eaves Old Town Pasadena. Situated just south of the 210 Freeway on Del Mar Boulevard, our Pasadena apartments offer excellent features and a prime location. There is an abundance of entertainment options nearby such as ArcLight Cinemas, the Pasadena Playhouse and the Old Pasadena Historic District. Numerous great restaurants are within walking distance as well, like Café Cordova, Houston's, Big Ben's Deli Café and Dots Cupcakes. Pasadena Apartment Community All of your needs are met with a convenient and comfortable lifestyle at eaves old Town Pasadena. We offer residents a wealth of great amenities including gas fireplaces, a sparkling swimming pool and remote access gated parking. We solve any issues that may crop up, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Pasadena today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Old Town Pasadena – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We provide great Old Town Pasadena apartments with a few little extras, like updated kitchens with quartz stone countertops, stainless steel appliances, hard surface flooring, and gas fireplaces in each apartment. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. When it comes down to it, our apartments in Old Town Pasadena offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Pasadena Apartments by eaves There are many reasons why people choose to live in the historic Pasadena area, and you should be able to come home to a place where you can live comfortably. This is precisely what you will be able to do at eaves Old Town Pasadena. Situated just south of the 210 Freeway on Del Mar Boulevard, our Pasadena apartments offer excellent features and a prime location. There is an abundance of entertainment options nearby such as ArcLight Cinemas, the Pasadena Playhouse and the Old Pasadena Historic District. Numerous great restaurants are within walking distance as well, like Café Cordova, Houston's, Big Ben's Deli Café and Dots Cupcakes. Pasadena Apartment Community All of your needs are met with a convenient and comfortable lifestyle at eaves old Town Pasadena. We offer residents a wealth of great amenities including gas fireplaces, a sparkling swimming pool and remote access gated parking. We solve any issues that may crop up, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life.
